title: Parliament to meet for three days from today (4)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The parliament is scheduled to convene on Wednesday (4) and proceedings will be held for 3 days from today.
Meanwhile, security around the parliament was increased since Tuesday (3) evening.
